name: Meditation
description: Sit back and relax with some meditation
instructions: Find a quiet place inside your house where you can find a comfortable sitting position. Close your eyes and pay attention only to your breathing, relaxing your body with each breath.

name: Creative Drawing
description: Let your creative juices flow with us
instructions: You will need a piece of paper and anything you can mark it with. Draw anything, inspired on something you already know, like a house, a few trees or your favorite celebrity.

name: Freeform Writing
instructions: You will need a piece of paper and anything you can mark it with. Write about anything you might be feeling at the moment.

name: Yoga
description: Yoga is a powerful tool for promoting relaxation and wellness, practice some of it with us
instructions: In a comfortable and quiet place, play our video and follow along with the instructor.

name: Stretching
description: Stretching a great way to wake up your body and bringing peace of mind
instructions: In a comfortable and quiet place, play our video and follow along with the instructor.

name: Meditation
description: Sit back and relax with some meditation
instructions: Find a quiet place inside your house where you can find a comfortable sitting position. Close your eyes and pay attention only to your breathing, relaxing your body with each breath.
